content:
This chunk provides important setup notes for a distributed rendering or simulation system. It specifies required command-line arguments for server configuration (clusterServerPort, clusterSyncFlag, etc.) and highlights potential limitations with multi-camera setups in the cluster environment. This context helps developers understand initial server requirements and known issues when working on distributed projects involving camera management across clients.

# NOTE: This assumes the following variables are set via bootstrap command line
# arguments on server startup:
#     clusterServerPort
#     clusterSyncFlag
#     clusterDaemonClient
#     clusterDaemonPort
# Also, I'm not sure multiple camera-group configurations are working for the
# cluster system.
